mainHero.title: Revolutionize Your Aquarium Experience
mainHero.subtitle: with AI-Powered Management
mainHero.description: Effortlessly monitor and optimize your aquarium with cutting-edge AI technology. Intelligently stock your aquarium with AI-driven suggestions, manage multiple aquariums seamlessly, and stay informed with real-time alerts, automated insights, and personalized care recommendations to keep your aquatic life thriving.

items.title: Your Personal Aquarium Assistant
items.description: Aquamind harnesses the power of AI to make aquarium management easier than ever. From intelligent stocking suggestions to automated monitoring, Aquamind is designed to simplify your aquarium care, so you can focus on enjoying your aquatic world.

items.title: Effortless Multi-Aquarium Management
items.description: Whether you own a single tank or manage multiple aquariums, Aquamind centralizes all your data and insights in one intuitive dashboard. Gain personalized recommendations and actionable alerts that keep all your tanks thriving with minimal effort.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
